original_text: One day, God will raise people up after they have died. They will become alive again. But then men and women will not marry. They will not have husbands or wives. Instead, they will be like the angels in heaven.
korean_text: 부활 때에는 장가도 아니 가고 시집도 아니 가고 하늘에 있는 천사들과 같으니라

sentences.original_text: One day, God will raise people up
sentences.korean_translation: 언젠가 하나님은 사람들을 다시 살리실 것이다

sentences.original_text: But then men and women will not marry.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그때는 남자와 여자가 결혼하지 않을 것이다

sentences.original_text: They will not have husbands or wives.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 남편이나 아내를 갖지 않을 것이다

sentences.original_text: Instead, they will be like the angels
